description: Developed Kalgatoâ€™s main website using Angular 13, SCSS, and Strapi for CMS. Hosted CMS on AWS EC2 with GitHub Actions for CI/CD. Utilized Scully for Static Site Generation (SSG) and hosted on AWS S3 with CDN for performance optimization

Multibagger Investments is a forward-thinking, mobile-responsive website dedicated to providing insightful financial advisory services globally. Built with Next.js for its dynamic frontend capabilities and Strapi CMS for efficient content management, this platform ensures optimal performance and accessibility for users across devices.
A chrome extension that allows you to have a personal chrome dashboard that shows you the crypto-currency, weather, the time, and the date
A web application that tracks the number of cases of Covid-19 in the world
A web application that shows the weather of a city
